tha-ap508:0.3_0: Held together and beasts of the sal trees,
tha-ap508:1.2_0: like the moon on the fifteenth day.
tha-ap508:1.4_0: and he saw the world speedless.
tha-ap508:2.2_0: to whom I gave the Teacher.
tha-ap508:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap508:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap508:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap508:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap508:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Māṇavagāmiya.
tha-ap508:8.1_0: a sixth month of the rainy season.
